main event: Mr. and Mrs. [redacted] observed an unusual object resembling a star that changed in intensity, moving in various directions for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The object was alternately bright and dim, zigzagging and hovering during observation., The size of the object was estimated to be 1/3 to 1/2 the size of the moon., It was observed from a mountainous area about 65 miles away., The witnesses described the color of the object as whitish., No conventional aircraft matched the description of the object seen.
